sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Local Government Wage Increase Transparency Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Local Government Wage Increase Transparency Act.

sections.heading: Disclosure of certain wage increases made to employees under Article 7 of the Illinois Pension Code.
sections.text: Disclosure of certain wage increases made to employees under Article 7 of the Illinois Pension Code.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
